metadata.title: USN-7017-1 -- Quagga vulnerability
metadata.description: Iggy Frankovic discovered that Quagga incorrectly handled certain BGP messages. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause Quagga to crash, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-7017-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  quagga - 1.2.4-4ubuntu0.5 quagga-bgpd - 1.2.4-4ubuntu0.5 quagga-core - 1.2.4-4ubuntu0.5 quagga-doc - 1.2.4-4ubuntu0.5 quagga-isisd - 1.2.4-4ubuntu0.5 quagga-ospf6d - 1.2.4-4ubuntu0.5 quagga-ospfd - 1.2.4-4ubuntu0.5 quagga-pimd - 1.2.4-4ubuntu0.5 quagga-ripd - 1.2.4-4ubuntu0.5 quagga-ripngd - 1.2.4-4ubuntu0.5 No subscription required
